data.name: Dreamlands: Cotton Candy Hunt
data.detailed_description:
A dream comes true ...

Collect cotton candies and discover Dreamlands.
Attention, danger, new challenges wait for you in each level and the clock is ticking! Only the fastest will master it.



  • Choose one of the characters Macy or Luke and unlock new skins.
  • Master your skills in this one-screen platformer: Precise jumps, accurate timing, knowing the fastest way - and you will make it.
  • Clear the campaign and get trophies.
  • Compare your best time with your friends.
  • Time-Runs - the Challenges for experts.
  • Not difficult enough? Be the first to master the marathon run: Play all levels at once, never successfully seen.
data.about_the_game:
A dream comes true ...

Collect cotton candies and discover Dreamlands.
Attention, danger, new challenges wait for you in each level and the clock is ticking! Only the fastest will master it.



  • Choose one of the characters Macy or Luke and unlock new skins.

  • Clear the campaign and get trophies.
  • Compare your best time with your friends.
  • Time-Runs - the Challenges for experts.
  • Not difficult enough? Be the first to master the marathon run: Play all levels at once, never successfully seen.
data.short_description: Avoid Spikes and cannons, run fast, jump precisely and collect enough candies to see all levels of Dreamlands. Once you have mastered the basics new challenges are waiting for you.

pc_requirements.minimum:
Minimum:
  • OS: Windows 10
  • Processor: Intel Core i5-2600 or higher
  • Memory: 2 GB RAM
  • Graphics: Geforce 940mx or higher
  • Storage: 250 MB available space

mac_requirements.minimum:
Minimum:
  • OS: macOS Big Sur Version 11.5.1 or higher
  • Processor: 1,3GHz Dual-Core Intel Core i5 or higher
  • Memory: 2 GB RAM
  • Graphics: Intel HD Graphics 5000 1536 MB or higher
  • Storage: 250 MB available space
